name: Black Mist
description: Black Mist is a 2D, roguelike action game. All stages are covered by darkness, thus it is necessary to shoot shiny bullets to the darkness and move carefully. Bullets and your life are shared as "Energy", and the enemy's power and ferocity will be increase with the passage of time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 40 MB available space
